mapper.select: select cart_id,price,p.product_id,product_name,amount,price*amount money from cart c,tmember m,product p where c.userid=m.id and c.product_id=p.product_id and m.id=#{userid}
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount} where product_id = #{product_id} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select product_name,sum(price*amount) money from cart c,product p where c.product_id=p.product_id group by product_name order by product_name
